column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Chamkar Morn police force cracked down on the opening of a fish game room in a Chinese Building along Norodom Boulevard
column5: Phnom Penh.------4 Chinese men were arrested and a fish game table was seized along with a number of other materials.------The men and evidence were sent to theÂ Bassac police station for questioning and legal action.------ PPR
